attributes.action: Re nationalise the generating capacity -The old Central Electricity Generating Board
attributes.additional_details: Some of the big energy companies are also involved in generating electricity  - then they sell it to themselves. Renationalsie the generating capacity thus all the energy companies are buying from the same source -the same playing field. Doing this will better measure an energy company performance and also give back control of the generating capacity to where it belongs -the British People
